rows.label: qst201209_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you must be the ones
Volette mentioned who want
to make Whelzaman Cookies.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes! We look forward
to learning from you!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0003
rows.name: ...Please teach us.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0004
rows.name:
I heard the story from Volette. I
know it's tough, but hang in there.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0005
rows.name: We will!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0006
rows.name: Let me explain a few things first.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0007
rows.name: Do you know of Whelzaman?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0008
rows.name: No...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0009
rows.name:
It's a fairy tale, about a
Driver who has protected
Invidia since ancient times.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0010
rows.name:
We give the cookies to local children
during the festival, hoping they'll
grow up to be as strong as Whelzaman.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0011
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0012
rows.name:
The dough isn't hard to make, but you
have to shape it into a strong,
cool-looking face. That's the tricky part.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0013
rows.name: That's no problem!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0014
rows.name:
We're Blades, so we know
all about Drivers.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0015
rows.name:
...Though our artistic
skills may be lacking.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0016
rows.name:
You can use the restaurant's
oven to bake. I'll need you
to make the dough.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0017
rows.name: Roger!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0018
rows.name: So, the ingredients?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0019
rows.name: Five Bright Figs and two Sparklesugars.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0020
rows.name:
Two Whisper Tomatoes, and
one Limdo Flamii Egg from
defeating a Limdo Flamii.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0021
rows.name: Got it! We'll gather those right away!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0022
rows.name:
You'll need quite a lot to hand
out, so make sure you get plenty!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0023
rows.name: ...How much is "quite a lot"?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0024
rows.name: That recipe is for ten cookies.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0025
rows.name:
You'll probably need to
make fifty, so you'll need
five times that amount.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0026
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0027
rows.name: But we have to give it our all!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0028
rows.name:
I'll be here, so let me know
when you have the ingredients.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0029
rows.name:
You can bring them bit by
bit. I'll bake a batch of ten
each time you have enough.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0030
rows.name: ...Understood.
